ratings.comment: One of the best profs I've had at UW-Madison
Awesome teacher. Makes every student feel seen and heard.

Theater 200 was terrible with Quanda; she might be better in person, but online she came across as condescending, vague, and dismissive, and instructions were NEVER clearly defined. Despite taking months to grade short assignments and often posting assignments days before they were due, she gave  students no flexibility. Save yourself a headache.
Tries to brainwash you and makes you think that Whites are the worst people in the world and African Americans are superior.

I took a class with Dr.Johnson this summer and it is amazing! The course name is AFROAMER 225 . I even dropped one of my required class to take this class. I love the classroom atmosphere which is encouraging and discussion-based.I would recommend all my friends to take her class. If I have the chance I would definitely take her class again!
I took this class for Comm B, and found Quanda to be really patronizing. We were assigned a text that was basically rules for writing a paper that should have been learned in high school.
